atomic_tests.name: Exfiltration Over SMB over QUIC (New-SmbMapping)
atomic_tests.description:
Simulates an attacker exfiltrating data over SMB over QUIC using the New-SmbMapping command.
Prerequisites:
  - A file server running Windows Server 2022 Datacenter: Azure Edition
  - A Windows 11 computer
  - Windows Admin Center

remote_path.description: The UNC path to the share on the file server

local_file.description: The local file to be transferred
